title: Louder Than Bombs. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2016)
description:
In theaters: April 8th, 2016

Description:

Two years after her sudden death, the family of famed photographer Isabelle Reed (Isabelle Huppert) is still trying to cope with their loss. Gene (Gabriel Byrne) struggles as a single parent. Jonah (Jesse Eisenberg), the elder son, has just had a baby of his own and finds the transition from child to parent daunting. The younger son, Conrad (newcomer Devin Druid), is a typical teenager, wearing his alienation as a badge of honor and resisting his fatherâ€™s attempts to connect. On the occasion of a major retrospective of Isabelleâ€™s work, Jonah returns home to help his father. All three men are flooded with memories, and secrets are unearthedâ€”most notably the truth behind the mysterious circumstances of Isabelleâ€™s death. Shifting between past and present, LOUDER THAN BOMBS is an intimate portrait of parents and children and the many things that tear them apart and bring them together.

Director: Joachim Trier

Writers: Joachim Trier

Actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Gabriel Byrne, Amy Ryan, Isabelle Huppert, Devin Druid

Genre: Drama

Run Time: 1 hour 49 minutes
